title: Camping
description: If the idea of spending a night under the starry sky, singing around a bonfire with your friends, and living out of a backpack for days is your idea of a vacation then you probably love camping. There is no better or immersive way to experience outdoor camping in India whether it is bird-watching, trekking, or just lying back to soak in the views than by living in a tent. There is no dearth of sites in India where you can encamp
